salt-tool-macos-config

  • Localization
  • View page source

Localization

force_124h

Customizes forcing of 12h / 24h format.

Values:

  • string [default: none]

    • 12h

    • 24h

hostname

Customizes hostname.

Values:

  • string

languages

Customizes available system languages.

Values:

  • list of strings (name and country are separated by a dash))

Example:

languages:
  - en-US
  - en-AU

measurements

Customizes measurement units.

Values:

  • string

    • metric

    • US

    • UK

timezone

Customizes timezone.

Values:

  • string

Example:

timezone: Europe/Paris
